name: dicekeeper
description: A Random NPC generator for D&D 5e

scripts.build: tsc src/ancestry_generator.ts src/archetype_generator.ts src/gender_generator.ts src/randomizers.ts && webpack
scripts.clear: cd src && del ancestry_generator.js archetype_generator.js gender_generator.js randomizers.js

author: Hekate V. Nichols
